channel.title: 2020 on Cognition Limits Imagination
channel.description: Recent content in 2020 on Cognition Limits Imagination

item.title: Raise Coverate Rate to 80
item.description: Recently I have done raising unit tests coverage rate of 2 packages to at least 80%. Of course, high coverage rate isn’t always a gold standard to achieve, and some corner conditions are not necessray to test, so 80% seems a number that tries to demonstrate most code paths are testable. These 2 packges with 0% and 20% unit test coverate rate at the time I started to modify. After some refactoring, both packages’ coverage rate reaches 80%.
